title: Chapter III - Bureau Of Public Work
content:
Chapter III - Bureau Of Public Work

State Regulations

Part 220 - Supplements; Effective Dates Of Annual Determinations; Rest Periods (ยง 220.1 to 220.4)

Part 221 - Civil Penalty: Criteria For Waiver Or Reduction Where Payment Is Made By A Prime Contractor Pursuant To Labor Law Section 223 (ยง 221.1)

Part 222 - Hauling of Aggregate Supply Construction Materials (ยง 222.1 to 222.2)

Part 223 - Public Work Registration System for Contractors and Subcontractors (ยง 223.1 to 223.3)

Part 225 - Repealed

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
